MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the DG7 postcode area of Corsock. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have been working on site throughout the evening and in order to finalise the permanent repair, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:00pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:52pm on Saturday 31st October 2020
